channel.title: Guitar rig (4)
channel.description:
Hey there fellow musicians!
Does anyone of you know [url=http://www.native-instruments.com/#/en/products/guitar/guitar-rig-4-pro/]Guitar Rig?[/url] It's a virtual amplifier (including effect pedals, different amps and cabins, ...)
It would be cool to (if there's an Macintosh involved, because I wouldn't trust Windows on that one) use the software as an amp during gigs, rehearseling, right?!
If you're a guitar player, get a USB-jack-thingy, and try it out. Could save you a few thousand dollars buying amps and effect-pedals!
http://www.native-instruments.com/#/en/products/guitar/guitar-rig-4-pro/

item.title: Guitar rig (4)
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:6, topic:307077”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=403227.msg2986539#msg2986539 date=1255029189]
i have guitar rig 3 and its fine…
[/quote]Its a fkn mess on the heavily distorted settings[/quote]
true, but it works fine when i use my distortion pedal

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar rig (4)
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

almost certainly driver related

wdm or directx audio wont cut it, you need to use a real asio driver (asio4all if you have a consumer level soundcard)

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar rig (4)
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:7, topic:307077”]I tried a similar program once, I don’t know why, but there was massive lag between me playing and the actual sound.[/quote]hardware or driver-related.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Hey there fellow musicians!

Does anyone of you know Guitar Rig?
It’s a virtual amplifier (including effect pedals, different amps and cabins, …)

It would be cool to (if there’s an Macintosh involved, because I wouldn’t trust Windows on that one) use the software as an amp during gigs, rehearseling, right?!

If you’re a guitar player, get a USB-jack-thingy, and try it out. Could save you a few thousand dollars buying amps and effect-pedals!
